sections.heading: Railway Council agreement with railroad; oversight
sections.text: The Department of Transportation shall oversee any outstanding agreement between a railroad and the Nebraska Railway Council as of August 27, 2011, including making any outstanding payment due to a railroad.SourceLaws 2011, LB259, ยง 2;Laws 2017, LB3

81-701.05.Nebraska Railway Council agreement with railroad; oversight.

The Department of Transportation shall oversee any outstanding agreement between a railroad and the Nebraska Railway Council as of August 27, 2011, including making any outstanding payment due to a railroad.

SourceLaws 2011, LB259, ยง 2;Laws 2017, LB339, ยง 280.
